Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Evolution: Put on one of your Angel Command creatures. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Players can't summon creatures other than light creatures or cast spells other than light spells.

card.name: Heavy Death Metal GS, Destruction Dragon God

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {WORLD BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, if it wasn't summoned, shuffle it into your deck.

card.name: Romanov the 1st GS, Lord of the Demonic Eye

property.name: Rules

card.name: Lunatic God GS, Emperor of the Gods

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ While you are summoning this creature, the mana number of Gods in your mana zone becomes 3 instead of 1. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose up to 3 of your opponent's creatures and return them to their owner's hand. Then you may draw 3 cards. ■ After this creature attacks, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your cards put into your hand from your shields gets "shield trigger". {ETERNAL OMEGA} (When this creature would leave, return it to your hand instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Infinity Power Attacker (While attacking, this creature has infinite power.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, break a shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 7000 or less. ■ While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Dokindam X GS, The Legendary Forbidden

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ This creature costs 90 less to summon. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, ignore any abilities of your opponent's creatures until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature with a spell that costs 4 or less, they can't choose this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ You can put an evolution creature of any race on this creature. ■ Your evolution creatures that evolve from this creature cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.
